biotools.summary: RNAcon is a web-server for the prediction and classification of non-coding RNAs. It uses SVM-based model for the discrimination between coding and ncRNAs and Random Forest-based prediction model for the classification of ncRNAs into different classes.

bioschemas.name: rnacon
bioschemas.summary: RNAcon is a web-server for the prediction and classification of non-coding RNAs. It uses SVM-based model for the discrimination between coding and ncRNAs and Random Forest-based prediction model for the classification of ncRNAs into different classes.
